title: ferrum360
author: ferrum360
content: Ole777.io blocked me for no reason, taking over $2,000 from my accountHere are my screenshots, which shows that I can not log into my account, and a letter.https://i.gyazo.com/df34bedd04b37e123f625d7c81b64f7f.pnghttps://i.gyazo.com/535550d2754cefea2078edb24084f581.pngOLE777 belongs to OLE GROUP. OLE GROUP is also are the owners of major betting broker VODDS.At the same time, VODDS reject a wide connection with OLE777, they only say that OLE777 work under their license.But OLE777 is used to receive the same crypto wallet as VODDS. Here are their main crypto wallets https://tronscan.org/#/address/TWgJUpNpmmUnkHtcfeF7JvCvEX7vobLYuY/transfers , and here are 2 auxiliary ones https://tronscan.org/#/address/THgteQ3XkP7owi9YFySqdH4qrovx3J4ANC/transfers and https://tronscan.org/#/ address/TPEPdLYtHr8cN1Jbwf6CGNB9Ppho7L2otr/transfersPayments from the account from the site OLE777 and VOODS came from the same wallet!!!So the scammers here are not only OLE777, but also VODDS, and the entire OLE GROUP organizationBeware of these scammers!

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: So what is happening with the site, Other use also came with the same case a few days ago. OLE777.IO Vietnamese scammers stole BIG amount from me. (proof inside) . Seems like an exit scam.OLE777Official is not active after 11th January. They also don't have any explanation on the previous thread. So it's very tough to say that they will come to resolve the issue.Btw did you do any mistakes according to their Terms and Condition?

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on January 16, 2023, 03:55:45 PMSeems like an exit scam.It wouldn't surprise me coming from a company that hires shill accounts to promote their service.Besides, their official representative said he will forward player's concerns to the team a week ago but didn't post an update or even log in since then.I advice everyone to stay away from this casino until they come back and resolve all these issues.
